definitions.definition: An advisement providing more up-to-date information than currently known.
definitions.example: He gave me an update on the situation in New York.

definitions.definition: A change in information, a modification of existing or known data.
definitions.example: I just made an update to the Wikipedia article on guerillas.

definitions.definition: An additional piece of information. An addition to existing information.
definitions.example: I just made an update to my blog about my trip to Rome.

definitions.definition: A modification of something to a more recent, up-to-date version; (in software) a minor upgrade.
definitions.example: I have a couple of updates to install on your laptop.

definitions.definition: A version of something which is newer than other versions.
definitions.example: You should try the update: it rocks.

definitions.definition: To bring (a thing) up to date.
definitions.example: I need to update my records to take account of the most recent transaction.

definitions.definition: To bring (a person) up to date: to inform (a person) about recent developments.
definitions.example: Update me on what happened while I was away.
